title: cygan
author: cygan
content: since tonight all images uploaded on imgur (which are uploaded via an unregistered account) have been deleted. so we don't get various images displayed here on bitcointalk, which could then also affect the auctions or various offers of our collectors.to solve this problem quickly, since the end of april there is a new service from the user joker_josue who has created a very useful tool/website especially for our forum, where you can upload your pictures/images.more info can be found in the original thread: TalkImg.com - Image hosting for BitcoinTalki've been using the website for my images for a few weeks now and i'm very happy with it. loading images in the forum has also become faster.
